type=on_load

hotspot=location

soundfx=soundfx/wood_open.ogg
mapmod=object,10,11,163
tooltip=Crate
hotspot=location
requires_not_status=cell_loot_3

loot=currency,fixed,50,100
type=on_trigger
repeat=false
location=10,11,2,2

location=4,2,1,2
